1  Do  not  let them take are  farmers    european   subsidy  away.
2 It  would  be good  if we  worryed   more  about fair trade  in are own  country in stead  of other  countrys.
3  In stead of giving   coucils  money to build  houses
how about  giving the money  to  boarder control to stop  immigration  being  such  a   big problem like it  is.
4 try  helping  pubs by stopping  supermarkets   cheap  alcholic  drinks  deals.
5 stop heavy advertising  in papers and on  tv so the small  shops can have a chance.
6 Make planning laws harder  not easyer  .
